q: - As soon as Fritz Grobe and Stephen Voltz dropped their first Mentos candies into a bottle of Diet Coke- launching an Internet phenomenon as a bubbling geyser shot into the air- the question began. It was daunting because people were saying, "Where's your next work of genius?" Voltz said. They put folks off for a while, managing the attention in 2006 that followed millions of Internet hits and appearances on national TV programs such as "The Late Show with David Letterman ."
?" David Letterman asked, to which Bieber replied: "I don't know. I'm Canadian." Later Bieber tweeted that he will be on the "Late Show" again on Friday, playing the drums and doing the Top Ten.

"We're happy the majority of workers at Mirafiori has understood Fiat's commitment to transform it into a plant with an international reach," Sergio Marchionne , 58, said in an e-mailed statement today. We're happy because workers with their vote showed they have confidence in their future. Our plan for this plant is very ambitious. Sergio Marchionne needs a majority of the 5,500 employees at the factory to sign off a Dec. 23 accord already approved by most unions as he seeks to turn around Fiat's unprofitable Italian operations and revitalize an alliance

Felt Compelled To Quit' Orange News David Cameron has confirmed his communications chief Andy Coulson felt compelled to resign because of "pressures on him and his family". Mr Andy Coulson , a former editor of the World, said continued coverage of events connected to my old job made it difficult David Cameron 's spin chief Andy Coulson quits today, saying the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the World was distracting from his job. is collapsing as more power is accruing to big, monied interests," Sen. Bernie Sanders said. "We need leadership in the White House and the Bill Clinton 's advisers on down who understand that reality." To me, it's a disaster, said New York-based labor activist Jonathan Tasini . "When the question on the table should be creating jobs, you have Joe Biden picking someone whose main role has been to put out this awful report on deficit cutting."

involved in the case- Waltham Forest Council, Luton Borough Council, Nottingham City Council, Sandwell Council, Kent County Council and Newham Council- were celebrating their victory. Sandwell Council leader Darren Cooper said: At the very least, we have been vindicated for bringing the action. Now we have to wait to see whether the Government accepts it was too hasty in scrapping the scheme. Meanwhile, Waltham Forest Council leader Chris Robbins said the decision was "a victory for common sense and fair play".
